subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution outside Iran .
Iraq (
Bellamy 2008 a
).

Host plant(s) within Iran .
Wild almond, white-thorn (
Amygdalus
sp.,
Crataegus
sp., Rosaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1997
),
Crataegus
sp. ( Rosaceae ) (
Borumand 2002
).

Distribution outside Iran .
None recorded.
